project_info_title: Scenic Coastal Retreat on Al Marjan Island
project_info_text:
Experience the epitome of beachfront elegance at Costa Mare, where sophisticated design meets the serene natural allure of Al Marjan Island. Unwind in beautifully curated residences offering uninterrupted Persian Gulf vistas, complemented by luxurious amenities for an unmatched coastal lifestyle.

Costa Mare by Ellington is a waterfront residential development in Ras Al Khaimah. Designed for luxury and tranquility, this contemporary project features premium residences with stunning sea views, high-end finishes, and spacious layouts. Positioned along pristine beaches, Costa Mare offers direct access to world-class leisure destinations, ensuring an unmatched coastal lifestyle.
amenities_title: Amenities and spaces designed for refined living
project_summary_title: Coastal Elegance on Al Marjan Island
map_text:
Set amid the picturesque Al Marjan Island, Costa Mare offers an exquisite blend of luxurious living and serene coastal lifestyle. Surrounded by pristine beaches and azure waters, this Ellington development invites you to explore nearby leisure havens, elegant resorts, and vibrant dining scenes.

Strategically located on Al Marjan Island, the project ensures seamless connectivity while preserving a tranquil island atmosphere.
map_address: Al Marjan Island, Ras Al Khaimah, UAE
footer_tagline: Luxury beachfront residences on Al Marjan Island
